content: this pattern is really close to my heart as i designed it for my sister in law s birthday as a gift i wanted to make something quick yet *beautifully textured* and *elegant* she loves pastel shades so the yarn cake i used was perfect for it this pattern is available for ***free on my blog*** here 1 or you can dowload an ad free pdf version from my ravelry store for a small fee **difficulty ** advanced beginner **finished size ** 175 cm/ 69 long and 45 cm/ 17 75 wide **gauge ** unimportant as your garment will be blocked upon finishing to the size given **us terms** used throughout **written pattern only with no chart** i hope you ll love it as much as i loved creating it happy crocheting *krisztina* 1 https //kamecrochet com/2021/03/30/kathleen-shawl/
